Identification_Area.title: PVO VENUS ION MASS SPECTROMETER LOW RES ION DENSITY V1.0

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: PVO VENUS ION MASS SPECTROMETER LOW RES ION DENSITY V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Pioneer Venus (PVO) Ion Mass Spectrometer (OIMS) low resolution ion density data set for the period periapsis +/- 30 minutes for orbits 1- 2996 (1978-12-05 - 1987-08-18).
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= The PV-OIMS low resolution dataset contains data from the Orbiter Ion Mass Spectrometer (OIMS) experiment for orbits 1-2996, including data for the period periapsis +/- 30 minutes for each orbit. The dataset is divided into multiple files, each of which contains 1 orbit. The user should be able to easily get to any desired orbit by selecting the appropriate file.
column type bytes description ========================== ======================================== date integer 5 Date given in the format YYDOY where YY is the year and DOY is the day-of-year (Jan 1 =1) UT float 10 Universal Time second of day orbit integer 7 PVO orbit number perisecs float 10 Seconds after periapsis, negative before periapsis den_1 integer 8 Number density of 1 AMU particle den_2 integer 8 Number density of 2 AMU particle den_4 integer 8 Number density of 4 AMU particle den_8 integer 8 Number density of 8 AMU particle den_12 integer 8 Number density of 12 AMU particle den_14 integer 8 Number density of 14 AMU particle den_16 integer 8 Number density of 16 AMU particle den_18 integer 8 Number density of 18 AMU particle den_28 integer 8 Number density of 28 AMU particle den_30 integer 8 Number density of 30 AMU particle den_32 integer 8 Number density of 32 AMU particle den_44 integer 8 Number density of 44 AMU particle
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note: The user should be aware that some of the data columns have been coded. For example, the values -999999 is the missing data value for that point.
